source: Mark Curran for U.S. Senate,WTTW - Chicago PBS
text: WTTW News's first candidate forum before the March 17th primaries, featuring the Republican candidates for U.S. Senate, airs tonight at 7:00 pm.  Learn more about each of the candidates in our Voter Guide.
Hear from those who know and worked alongside Mark Curran and saw firsthand the content of his character, his dedication to the Constitution, and his outspoken support of conservative principles.
I am leaving the Courthouse after a NG Verdict for my client. Defending liberty and upholding the Constitution.

I'll be participating in the WTTW - Chicago PBS Candidate Forum this evening. The forum airs live at 7PM (CT) and will last about 30 minutes. There should also be a live stream available on WTTW's website (or at least a video upload of the forum after it airs). If you haven't done so already, check out my profile in the WTTW Voter Guide.

The attacks I have taken have been based upon lie after lie. Everyone should know I supported Donald Trump for President in 2016 and that I support him in 2020. Everyone should know that I never supported a piece of legislation that was not supported by the Illinois Chiefs of Police Association. Everyone should know that I spent my life in law enforcement and support strong borders and a rule of law. An example of the latest lie is that because I am a Catholic I will do whatever the Pope says, even though I don’t personally care for this Pope, and do not believe he understands American exceptionalism. I am not lying this is what Satan is up to. Read the first comment below, that I reference in my comment. These comments are commonplace.

text: There is only one candidate who has teen tried and tested.  A man of impeccable credentials, a man who upholds the rule of law, and has demonstrated integrity and honor at every turn.  But don’t believe me, how about believing some American heroes and conservative icons?

McHenry Strong.

They are circulating my literature and grateful that I was one of the first law enforcement officials to proudly support concealed carry, despite being from a Blue County.

source: Mark Curran for U.S. Senate,Illinois Sheriffs' Association
text: I stand in agreement with Sheriff Mike Downey, Livingston County Sheriff Tony Childress, and the Illinois Sheriffs' Association and against this change. This is a wrong shift in policy and a dangerous action taken by Governor JB Pritzker and the Illinois Department of Corrections.Thank you to Sheriff Mike Downey and Livingston County Sheriff Tony Childress for speaking out about a recent policy change by the Illinois Department of Corrections that allows dangerous felons to be released back into Illinois communities, rather than safely transferred to a secure facility. More troubling is that there is no notice or warning given to local or federal authorities when the individuals are released.

"As a candidate for senator, Curran gets our attention because he shares our worries about the Illinois Exodus of residents and understands its root cause: 'People are leaving Illinois because the government spends and taxes them more than they can afford,' he wrote in his Tribune Editorial Board candidate questionnaire."
